# Titanic Survival Predictor

```{r, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
# Dependencies
dependencies <- c("tidyverse", "ggplot2", "readr", "here", "rsample")
for (pkg in dependencies) {
  if (!require(pkg, character.only = TRUE)) {
    install.packages(pkg)
  }
  library(pkg, character.only = TRUE)
}
```

```{r}
# Importing the data
path <- here::here("data", "Titanic-Dataset.csv")
data <- read_csv(path)
data
```

##Split Data
```{r}
set.seed(123)
split_data <- initial_split(data, prop = 0.9)

titanic_training <- training(split_data)
titanic_test <- testing(split_data)
titanic_test
```

##Corelation Passanger class and Cabin Number
```{r}
class_cabin_data <- data %>% 
  select(Pclass, Cabin) %>%
  filter(!is.na(Cabin)) %>%
  mutate(cabin_prefix = substr(Cabin, 1, 1))

View(class_cabin_data)
```
